translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
welcome to Beyoncé Homecoming 2018.
Beychella! Beychella! Beychella!
Beyoncé! Beyoncé! Beyoncé!
Beyoncé! Beyoncé! Beyoncé!
Beyoncé! Beyoncé! Beyoncé!
- Coachella. You ready? -
Let's go get 'em.
Coachella, y'all dance with me. Come on. Hey!
Come on!
Do you slay?
I think what you're trying to ask is, uh,
translation.es: Creo que lo que intentas preguntar

translation.en: why am I so insistent upon...
giving out to them that Blackness,
that Black Power, that Black--
Pushing them to identify
translation.es: Los empujo a que se identifiquen

translation.en: with, uh, Black culture.
I think that is what you're asking.
translation.es: Creo que eso es lo que preguntabas.

translation.en: I have no choice over it in the first place.
translation.es: En primer lugar, no tengo elección.

translation.en: To me, we are the most beautiful creatures in the whole world;
translation.es: Para mí, somos las criaturas más hermosas del mundo.

translation.en: Black people.
My job is to somehow
translation.es: Mi trabajo consiste en, de algún modo,

translation.en: make them curious enough, or persuade them,
translation.es: hacer que tengan curiosidad o persuadirlos...

translation.en: by hook or crook,
to get more aware of themselves and where they came from
translation.es: para que sean más conscientes de sí mismos, de dónde vienen,

translation.en: and what they are into, and what is already there
translation.es: de lo que les gusta, de lo que ya está ahí

translation.en: and just to bring it out.
This is what compels me to compel them.
translation.es: Esto es lo que me obliga a obligarlos.

translation.en: And I will do it by whatever means necessary.
translation.es: Y usaré los medios que sean necesarios.

translation.en: Which one do you think is better?
I mean, I think we could use another music run- through...
translation.es: Creo que deberíamos hacer otro ensayo de la música.

translation.en: Okay.  And get all the departments because...
translation.es: - De acuerdo. - Que participen todos los departamentos.

translation.en: the people who haven't seen the show, like seen the run- through over there,
translation.es: Los que no vieron el espectáculo o el ensayo

translation.en: are super unclear on what the vibe is.
translation.es: no entienden cuál es el estilo.

translation.en: - What this is. - Yeah.
Agreed.
I'm with you.  People who have just saw it...
translation.es: - Estoy de acuerdo. - Quienes lo vieron...

translation.en: Then they got it. They just now getting it. Got it.
translation.es: Ellos lo entienden. Comienzan a entenderlo. Bien.

translation.en: Okay, so can we see if it's a good time to do that?
translation.es: Bien. ¿Este es un buen momento para hacerlo?

translation.en: They can be here til' eight.
- What time is it? - It's 6:30.
Let's go.
- Go over there? - Yeah.
I grew up in Houston, Texas,
visiting Prairie View.
We rehearsed at TSU
translation.es: Ensayamos en el Third Ward, en la Universidad del Sur de Texas,

translation.en: for many years in Third Ward,
translation.es: Ensayamos en el Third Ward, en la Universidad del Sur de Texas, durante muchos años.

translation.en: and I always dreamed of going to an HBCU.
translation.es: Siempre soñé con ir a una universidad históricamente negra.

translation.en: My college was Destiny's Child.
My college was traveling around the world, and life was my teacher.
translation.es: Mi universidad fue viajar por el mundo y la vida mi maestra.

translation.en: I wanted a Black orchestra.
I wanted the steppers, I needed the vocalists.
translation.es: Quería los bailarines, necesitaba a los vocalistas.

translation.en: I wanted different characters; I didn't want us all doing the same thing.
translation.es: Quería diferentes personajes. No quería que todos hiciéramos lo mismo.

translation.en: And the amount of swag is just limitless. Like...
the things that these young people can do
translation.es: Las cosas que estos jóvenes pueden hacer con sus cuerpos

translation.en: with their bodies, and the music they can play, and...
translation.es: Las cosas que estos jóvenes pueden hacer con sus cuerpos y la música que tocan...

translation.en: the drumrolls, and the haircuts, and the bodies, and the...
translation.es: Los tambores, los cortes de pelo, los cuerpos...

translation.en: It's just not right.
It's just so much damn swag.
It's just gorgeous, and it makes me proud. And, um...
I wanted every person that has ever been dismissed because of the way they look
translation.es: Quería que todos los que han sido rechazados por su aspecto

translation.en: to feel like they were on that stage.
translation.es: sintieran que estaban en ese escenario.

translation.en: Killing 'em. Killing 'em.
And I want this to be, uh...
an experience where we all have growth,
we all have to push ourselves and have to dig deep inside of ourselves
translation.es: Todos debemos esforzarnos y buscar en nuestro interior

translation.en: to become better human beings.
translation.es: para poder ser mejores seres humanos.

translation.en: And I wanna start off with a prayer.
translation.es: Y quiero empezar con una oración.

translation.en: All right.
God, thank you so much for everyone here.
translation.es: Dios, gracias por todos los que están aquí.

translation.en: Thank you for bringing all of these human beings into my life.
translation.es: Gracias por traer a todas estas personas a mi vida.

translation.en: God, I ask that this is an experience that...
translation.es: Dios, te pido que podamos recordar...

translation.en: we all remember forever.
I ask that we're able to touch people and give them hope.
translation.es: Te pido que podamos  tocar a la gente y darle esperanza.

translation.en: To make people feel beautiful, strong...
translation.es: Para que se sientan hermosos, fuertes...

translation.en: and united.
God, I ask that you just use us.
translation.es: Dios, te pido que nos uses.

translation.en: I ask that we all grow, and we all connect.
translation.es: Te pido que crezcamos y que nos conectemos.

translation.en: And Lord, thank you so much for choosing us.
Thank you for bringing everyone here into my life.
translation.es: Gracias por traer a esta gente a mi vida.

translation.en: We give you all the praise and glory, amen.
Amen.
So, I want us to have fun
and just, we have so much to learn.
'Cause we're here to rehearse,
and eventually we'll get on that stage and just let it all go,
translation.es: pero luego subiremos a ese escenario y lo soltaremos.

translation.en: and feel the spirit and have us a good time.
translation.es: Nos sentiremos bien y nos divertiremos.

translation.en: But, right now, it's still janky,
and we got so much to learn and work out.
translation.es: Tenemos mucho que aprender y que resolver.

translation.en: So I wanted us to feel each other's energy,
translation.es: Quería que sintiéramos la energía del otro.

translation.en: and dance, and scream, and holler, and hoot. Do whatever we feel naturally.
translation.es: Bailaremos, aullaremos, gritaremos, y haremos lo que nos sale naturalmente.

translation.en: And we're gonna build this thing together.
So let's just do it.
Let me hear you sing.
Bug a Boos.
I need a good laugh.
You.
Make me laugh.
Bug a Boos!
We got you, right?
That is so funny!
Did that make us laugh?
No!
Think about it.
Bug a Boos!
Fall in line.
Ladies.
Ladies.
Ladies.
Are we smart?
Yes!
Are we strong?
Yes!
Have we had enough of the bullshit?
Show me.
I see you. How did you do that so fast? She has on my outfit, y'all.
translation.es: Te veo. ¿Cómo lo hiciste tan rápido? Ella tiene todo mi atuendo.

translation.en: Sing it, ladies.
Right, ladies?
Yes.
Coachella!
Thank y'all so much for having us once again.
I'm so honored to be on this stage tonight.
translation.es: Es un honor estar en este escenario esta noche.

translation.en: This next song is for all of my queens.
translation.es: Esta canción es para todas mis reinas.

translation.en: Do we have any beautiful queens in the house tonight?
I want y'all to sing along if you know the lyrics.
translation.es: Quiero que canten si conocen la letra.

translation.en: It's called Bow Down.
Listen.
Do one more!
When I decided to do Coachella,
instead of me pulling out my flower crown,
translation.es: en lugar de sacar mi corona de flores...

translation.en: it was more important that I brought our culture to Coachella.
translation.es: ...me pareció más importante traer nuestra cultura al festival.

translation.en: There was a four- month period
translation.es: Hubo un período de cuatro meses

translation.en: of rehearsals
with Derek and the band before we started
translation.es: con Derek y la banda antes de empezar

translation.en: the four months of dance rehearsals.
translation.es: los cuatro meses de ensayos de baile.

translation.en: The music and those vocal rehearsals--
translation.es: La música y los ensayos vocales

translation.en: that's the heartbeat of the show.
I wanted all of these different characters,
and I wanted it to feel the way I felt
translation.es: y que se sintiera como me sentí

translation.en: when I went to battle of the bands,
translation.es: cuando fui a la batalla de las bandas.

translation.en: because I grew up seeing those shows, and that being the highlight of my year.
translation.es: Crecí viendo esos espectáculos. Eran lo mejor de todo el año.

translation.en: Five, six, seven, go.
Five, swipe, right, left,
swipe, step, clap.
So I studied my history, I studied my past,
translation.es: Así que estudié mi historia, estudié mi pasado,

translation.en: and I put every mistake,
all of my triumphs,
of my 22- year career
into my two- hour homecoming performance.
translation.es: en esta celebración de bienvenida de dos horas.

translation.en: Looking at what she wanted to bring to the community,
translation.es: Ella quiso darle esto a nuestra comunidad.

translation.en: and caring about current events,
and caring about what, you know, her people are going through,
translation.es: lo que le pasa a su gente,

translation.en: and wanting to shed light,
and wanting to put, you know, a proud moment on stage for us,
translation.es: y brindarnos un momento de orgullo en el escenario.

translation.en: it gives you a boost. It's like, Wow!
They heard her say it without saying it.
Let's get it together. Let's move forward, let's unify.
All of those things existed in this performance.
translation.es: Todos esos elementos están en esta presentación.

translation.en: It felt like we were all connected,
and it literally felt like we were in our own university
translation.es: y que estábamos en nuestra propia universidad

translation.en: and struggling together.
The hours were unbelievable.
We did a pass without any music.
And just to hear the energy in all the stops, and...
translation.es: Escuchar la energía en las paradas,

translation.en: to feel the shaking of the risers on the pyramid,
translation.es: sentir el temblor de los que estaban arriba en la pirámide,

translation.en: to hear the harmonies live was just as entertaining.
translation.es: oír las armonías en vivo era igual de entretenido.

translation.en: Coachella, I wanna hear y'all sing.
How y'all doing over here?
I can see you all the way. All the way back there.
translation.es: Los veo a todos. Incluso a los de allí atrás.

translation.en: Sing it, y'all!
Sing.
- Come on, sing! -
- Sing. -
- Sing it. -
Sing it.
Say, I'm- a a diva. Sing it.
- Say, I'm- a a diva. Sing it. - ♪ I'm- a a diva ♪
- Louder. I'm- a a diva. Louder. - ♪ I'm- a a diva ♪
translation.es: Más fuerte. I'm-a a diva. Fuerte.

translation.en: Can't hear you. I'm- a a diva.
translation.es: No los oigo. I'm-a a diva.

translation.en: - Sing it. - ♪ I'm- a a diva ♪
Come on.
Divas, y'all help me sing this next verse? Here we go.
translation.es: Divas, ¿me ayudan a cantar la siguiente estrofa? Aquí vamos.

translation.en: I was supposed to do Coachella the year prior.
translation.es: Debía presentarme en Coachella el año anterior.

translation.en: But...
I got pregnant unexpectedly.
And it ended up being twins,
which was even more of a surprise.
My body went through more than I knew it could.
translation.es: Mi cuerpo sufrió más de lo que yo sabía que podía soportar.

translation.en: I was 218 pounds the day I gave birth.
translation.es: Pesaba 100 kilos el día que di a luz.

translation.en: I had an extremely difficult pregnancy.
I had high blood pressure,
I developed toxemia, preeclampsia,
and, in the womb,
one of my babies' heartbeat paused a few times,
translation.es: el latido del corazón de uno de mis bebés se detuvo un par de veces,

translation.en: so I had to get an emergency C- section.
translation.es: así que tuvieron que hacerme una cesárea de urgencia.

translation.en: Home is something very peculiar.
translation.es: El hogar es algo muy peculiar.

translation.en: There is a yearning in it, you know?
Something special, mystical, hopeful,
restful.
- Here we go.First combination. -
translation.es: PRIMER ENSAYO TRAS EL EMBARAZO Aquí vamos. La primera combinación.

translation.en: - First... - I been getting to.
That go:
I been getting to.
It's my first time back home,
translation.es: Es la primera vez que estoy en casa,

translation.en: on the stage, after giving birth.
translation.es: en el escenario, después de dar a luz.

translation.en: I'm creating my own homecoming.
And it's hard.
There were days that I thought, you know, I'd never be the same.
translation.es: Hubo días en los que pensé que yo no volvería a ser como antes.

translation.en: I'd never be the same physically,
my strength and endurance would never be the same.
translation.es: mi fuerza y resistencia no volverían a ser las mismas.

translation.en: Between SoulCycle and coming in here,
translation.es: Entre el spinning y venir aquí...

translation.en: - you're losing like 1,500- 2,000 calories. - Calories, yeah.
It's true. And, eventually,
I wanna be able to do SoulCycle, the stairs, and rehearse in a day.
translation.es: quiero poder hacer el spinning, las escaleras y ensayar en un mismo día.

translation.en: Okay. Lit. I'll be right there with you.
And you know, a lot of the choreography
is about feeling, so it's not as technical.
translation.es: importa el sentimiento que transmites, así que no son tan técnicas.

translation.en: It's your own personality that brings it to life.
translation.es: Tu propia personalidad es lo que le da vida.

translation.en: And that's hard when you don't feel like yourself.
translation.es: Eso es difícil cuando sientes que no eres tú misma.

translation.en: I had to rebuild my body
from cut muscles.
It took me a while to feel confident enough to freak it,
translation.es: Me tomó un tiempo sentirme lo suficientemente confiada

translation.en: and give it my own personality.
In the beginning, it was so many muscle spasms.
translation.es: Al principio, tenía muchos espasmos musculares.

translation.en: Just, internally, my body was not connected.
translation.es: Internamente, mi cuerpo no estaba conectado.

translation.en: My mind was not there.
My mind wanted to be with my children.
translation.es: Mi mente quería estar con mis hijos.

translation.en: What people don't see is the sacrifice.
translation.es: Lo que la gente no ve es el sacrificio.

translation.en: I would dance, and go off to the trailer,
and breastfeed the babies,
and the days I could, I would bring the children.
translation.es: y los días que podía, llevaba a los niños.

translation.en: Like, it gets messy.
Like, it's this-- I'm not even joking, this fast.
translation.es: No estoy bromeando. Es así de rápido.

translation.en: Yes.
- It's doable, but... - It's fast.
- This is grounding. - Yes.
translation.es: - Esto te trae a la tierra.  - Sí.

translation.en: Like, no matter who you are,
- you get in here, and it's real. - Uh- huh.
translation.es: Entras aquí y esto es real.

translation.en: - Yeah. -
That's what people don't get. That's why--
translation.es: Eso es lo que la gente no entiende.

translation.en: That's why people don't like to rehearse.
translation.es: Por eso no les gusta ensayar.

translation.en: - You gotta be humble. - Uh- huh.
You gotta be willing to look awkward, and...
translation.es: Debes estar dispuesto a parecer torpe...

translation.en: - you gotta study, be a student. -
I might...
pass out!
Five, six. Five, six, let's go.
- Hup! - Again.
- Hup! - Now release it.
Well, I feel a little of the jerkiness...
is going now.
In order for me to meet my goal,
translation.es: 65 DÍAS ANTES DE COACHELLA Para poder lograr mi objetivo, no consumo pan, carbohidratos,

translation.en: I'm limiting myself to no bread, no carbs,
translation.es: Para poder lograr mi objetivo, no consumo pan, carbohidratos,

translation.en: no sugar, no dairy,
no meat, no fish, no alcohol.
And I'm hungry.
Just trying to figure out how to balance being a mother of a six- year- old
translation.es: Intentaba hallar el modo de ser madre de una niña de seis años

translation.en: and of twins that need me
translation.es: y de mellizos que me necesitan,

translation.en: and giving myself creatively and, um, physically.
translation.es: y al mismo tiempo entregarme creativa y físicamente.

translation.en: It was a lot to juggle.
It's not like before, when I could rehearse, you know, 15 hours straight.
translation.es: No es como antes, cuando podía ensayar 15 horas seguidas.

translation.en: I have children, I have a husband. I have to take care of my body.
translation.es: Tengo hijos, tengo un marido. Debo cuidar mi cuerpo.

translation.en: There she is.
Hi, my babies!
Hi, Baba! Hi, baby!
Hi, this is me!
I definitely pushed myself further than I knew I could.
translation.es: Me esforcé más de lo que sabía que podía.

translation.en: And I've learned a very valuable lesson--
translation.es: Y aprendí una lección muy valiosa.

translation.en: I will never...
...never push myself that far again.
I feel like I'm just a new--
translation.es: Siento que soy una mujer nueva.

translation.en: A new woman, in a new chapter of my life,
translation.es: Este es un nuevo capítulo de mi vida.

translation.en: and I'm not even trying to be who I was.
translation.es: Ni siquiera trato de ser quien era.

translation.en: It's just so beautiful that children...
translation.es: Es tan hermoso que los niños...

translation.en: do that to you.
- You have to get three turns. - Okay, best out of three.
translation.es: - Tienes que dar tres vueltas. - El mejor de tres.

translation.en: Okay, this is seriously a huge accomplishment.
translation.es: QUÍTESE LOS ZAPATOS ANTES DE ENTRAR - GRACIAS Este es un gran logro.

translation.en: Because I did not think I'd ever get back in my old costume, and I'm actually in it.
translation.es: No creí que mi viejo vestuario fuera a quedarme.Pero me queda.

translation.en: And I can still move...
I still have a ways to go, but this makes me feel good,
translation.es: Aún me falta mucho, pero esto me hace sentir bien,

translation.en: 'cause I've been sacrificing and working hard.
translation.es: porque me sacrifiqué y trabajé mucho.

translation.en: - Huge, huge, huge accomplishment. Yay! - Ooh!
Are you going to wear it for rehearsals? - No, I'm not! - Okay.
translation.es: - ¿Lo usarás para los ensayos?  - ¡Claro que no!

translation.en: You're gonna go out to dinner in it?
Although, I do wanna tell-- go show Jay. It's a big deal.
translation.es: Pero quiero mostrárselo a Jay. Es algo importante.

translation.en: Why don't you take a walk across the--  I ain't walking there. Doing too much.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no caminas...? - No caminaré por ahí.

translation.en: Hi. Can we talk to Mr. Carter, please?
translation.es: Hola. ¿Podemos hablar con el Sr. Carter?

translation.en: Of course.
- Yup. - I'm back in my costume.
All right!
Big deal!
- All right! - It's zipped.
All right. Just had to share.
Why aren't guys as excited?
Twins, tell 'em.
How are y'all feeling?
Coachella.
How did you wake up this morning?
All right. I want y'all to repeat after me.
Say it.
Check this out. After Beyoncé perform,
translation.es: Oigan. Después de que se presente Beyoncé,

translation.en: after she done the decks,
Coachella gotta rename Coachella to Beychella.
translation.es: Coachella debe cambiar su nombre a Beychella.

translation.en: New name alert: Beychella.
Y'all know this one, I want y'all to sing along.
translation.es: Conocen esta canción. Quiero que canten conmigo.

Bop.

♪ Hey! Let's go! Hey! ♪
- Bug a Boos! Hey! - All together now!
My name is Edidiong Emah. I am originally from Nigeria,
translation.es: Me llamo Edidiong Emah. Soy de Nigeria, me crié en Atlanta...

translation.en: grew up in Atlanta, and...
translation.es: Soy de Nigeria, me crié en Atlanta...

translation.en: this dream is something that I never could dream up for myself.
translation.es: y esto es algo que jamás hubiera soñado para mí.

translation.en: I couldn't dream this big at all.
translation.es: Nunca soñé con algo tan grande.

translation.en: I never thought I would be here,
thought I would be too short, too thick.
translation.es: Soy demasiado baja, con demasiadas curvas.

translation.en: Actually, my whole family went to Morehouse and Spelman,
translation.es: Toda mi familia estudió en Morehouse y Spelman,

translation.en: which are HBCUs in Atlanta.
So to do this and...
to have, you know,
the Pan and, you know, sororities and things that...
translation.es: ...a las sororidades de las universidades negras...

translation.en: Black families value
translation.es: ...y lo que las familias negras valoran

translation.en: up on a stage for the world to see and understand us a little bit more...
translation.es: ...y lo que las familias negras valoran para que el mundo nos vea y nos entienda...

translation.en: It's just all a blessing.
I just toss it up,
and catch it in my spirit first, and then real life second.
translation.es: y lo atrapo con mi espíritu primero y luego en la vida real.

translation.en: In each of us,
another woman or a young girl might see a reflection of herself;
translation.es: otra mujer o muchacha quizá vea un reflejo de sí misma,

translation.en: of her worth, of her boundless potential.
translation.es: de su valor, de su potencial ilimitado.

translation.en: The youth need to see their greatness reflected in our eyes.
translation.es: La juventud necesita ver su grandeza reflejada en nuestros ojos.

translation.en: Go forth. Let them know we're real.
Well...
I waited 37 weeks...
to be here.
Being pregnant, so... I didn't dance for a year.
translation.es: Como estuve embarazada, no bailé por un año.

translation.en: Looking out there into that crowd, I was overwhelmed
translation.es: Cuando vi a esa multitud, estaba abrumada.

translation.en: and I feel so honored and so great being a part of something so epic,
translation.es: Me siento muy honrada y genial de poder ser parte de algo tan grandioso.

translation.en: that my son can watch when he's older and...
translation.es: Mi hijo podrá verlo cuando crezca.

translation.en: identify with the people, identify with the culture.
translation.es: Se identificará con la gente, con la cultura.

translation.en: And I'm just so honored to be a part of something that he can watch, and be proud of me, and say,
translation.es: Es un honor para mí ser parte de algo que lo hará sentirse orgulloso de mí.

translation.en: My mom was a part of that, my mom did that.
translation.es: Podrá decir: Mi mamá fue parte de eso. Mi mamá lo hizo.

translation.en: It's hard to believe that, after all these years,
translation.es: Cuesta creer que, después de todos estos años,

translation.en: I was the first African- American woman to headline Coachella.
translation.es: fui la primera mujer afroamericana en encabezar Coachella.

translation.en: It was important to me that everyone
that had never seen themselves represented
translation.es: que quienes nunca se habían visto representados

translation.en: felt like they were on that stage with us.
translation.es: sintieran que estaban en ese escenario con nosotros.

translation.en: As a Black woman,
I used to feel like the world wanted me to stay in my little box.
translation.es: solía sentir que el mundo quería que me quedara en mi cajita.

translation.en: And Black women often feel underestimated.
translation.es: Las mujeres negras suelen sentir que las subestiman.

translation.en: I wanted us to be proud of not only the show, but...
translation.es: Quería que estuviéramos orgullosas no solo del espectáculo,

translation.en: the process.
Proud of the struggle.
Thankful for the beauty that comes with a painful history
translation.es: Agradecidas por la belleza que viene con una historia dolorosa

translation.en: and rejoice in the pain.
translation.es: y que nos regocijáramos con el dolor.

translation.en: Rejoice in the imperfections and the wrongs that are so damn right.
translation.es: Que nos regocijáramos  con las imperfecciones y los errores que son correctos.

translation.en: And I wanted everyone to feel grateful for their curves,
translation.es: Quería que todas estuvieran agradecidas por sus curvas,

translation.en: their sass, their honesty,
thankful for their freedom.
It was no rules,
and we were able to create a free, safe space
translation.es: y pudimos crear un ambiente seguro

translation.en: where none of us were marginalized.
The most disrespected person in America is the Black woman.
translation.es: Las personas menos respetadas en EE. UU. son las mujeres negras.

translation.en: The most unprotected person in America is the Black woman.
translation.es: Las personas más desprotegidas en EE. UU. son las mujeres negras.

translation.en: The most neglected person in America is the Black woman.
translation.es: Las personas más abandonadas en EE. UU. son las mujeres negras.

translation.en: Are y'all ready, Coachella?
I wanna see everybody from the front to the back.
translation.es: Quiero verlos a todos, desde el frente hacia atrás.

translation.en: Put your hand up.
Sing it now, hey! Hey! Hey!
Jump!
Jump!
Let me see you jump.
Here we go!
Three, two, one!
I gotta go home.
- To my fifty- 'leven children. -
I know I gotta go home.
translation.es: Sé que debo irme a casa.

translation.en: - - He's looking at me like, You too lit to quit, it's time to go.
translation.es: Él me mira como diciendo: No vas a parar. Es hora de irse.

translation.en: He's like, You do need to quit, ma'am.
translation.es: - Debe rendirse, señora. - Solo por diversión.

translation.en: Just for shits and giggles, could you do this one, too?
translation.es: - Debe rendirse, señora. - Solo por diversión. ¿Haces esta también?

translation.en: You know, yeah. There you go.
- That's what-- All right, I'm set. - Too lit.
You know, I respect things that take work.
I respect things that are built from the ground up.
translation.es: Respeto las cosas construidas desde cero.

translation.en: You know, I'm super specific about every detail.
translation.es: Soy muy específica con cada detalle.

translation.en: I personally selected each dancer,
every light, the material on the steps,
translation.es: cada luz, el material en los escalones,

translation.en: the height of the pyramid, the shape of the pyramid,
translation.es: la altura y la forma de la pirámide,

translation.en: every patch was hand sewn.
translation.es: cada parche, la canción de cierre...

translation.en: Every tiny detail had an intention.
translation.es: Cada pequeño detalle tenía una intención.

translation.en: There were so many meetings with Olivier...
before he flew to Los Angeles
translation.es: ...antes de que él viniera a Los Ángeles

translation.en: so we could understand, Okay, why do we want these colors?
translation.es: para que pudiéramos comprender: ¿Por qué queremos estos colores?

translation.en: What do they represent?
What is the silhouette?
What is gonna look the most graphic?
How do we look united?
But how do we have these different characters
that stand out?
It took months for us to script the show.
translation.es: Nos llevó meses escribir el guion del espectáculo.

translation.en: When you spend so many months on choreography and arrangements,
translation.es: Cuando pasas tantos meses haciendo coreografías y arreglos,

translation.en: and when there are over 200 people on the stage,
translation.es: y cuando hay más de 200 personas en el escenario,

translation.en: you want to make sure you see everything,
translation.es: quieres asegurarte de que se vea todo.

translation.en: and I was very adamant
that we were well rehearsed and we knew the show
translation.es: El espectáculo debía estar bien ensayado. Todos debían saberlo de adelante hacia atrás.

translation.en: front to back.
translation.es: Todos debían saberlo de adelante hacia atrás.

translation.en: It was a lot of Steadicam,
and we did things that were very unconventional
for a festival show.
translation.es: en un espectáculo de un festival.

translation.en: I had three soundstages.
There was one soundstage for the band,
there was one soundstage for dancing,
and there was one soundstage for my creative staff.
translation.es: y un plató para mi personal creativo.

translation.en: And I would go from one to the next.
translation.es: Y yo iba de uno a otro.

translation.en: It takes a huge team, it takes...
a village,
and I think we all worked to our limit.
In the rehearsals, I am...
directing and watching the show.
translation.es: yo dirigía y miraba el espectáculo.

translation.en: I'm in the audience and I'm able to be on the stage
translation.es: Estaba entre el público y también en el escenario.

translation.en: and kind of see the stage at the same time.
translation.es: Podía ver el escenario al mismo tiempo.

translation.en: After every run- through there's a meeting with, you know, at least 50 people,
translation.es: Después de cada pasada, nos reuníamos, por lo menos, 50 personas.

translation.en: all of the department heads.
Not only does Derek have to record the choir,
translation.es: Derek no solo tiene que grabar al coro,

translation.en: he has to record the rumble of the structure, the stomps.
translation.es: sino también el estruendo de la estructura y las pisadas.

translation.en: He has to record everybody's, Hey! Ah!
And that adds another element of the performance
translation.es: Y eso suma otro elemento de la presentación

translation.en: that feels so good on the stage,
translation.es: que se siente tan bien en el escenario,

translation.en: and it's not translating on film.
translation.es: pero no se capta en la filmación.

translation.en: Until I see some of my notes applied,
translation.es: Hasta que no se implementen mis sugerencias,

translation.en: it doesn't make sense for me to make more.
translation.es: no tiene sentido que haga más.

translation.en: And it doesn't matter how many months we've done it, how many times we've done it.
translation.es: No importa cuántos meses lo hayamos ensayado.

translation.en: There are notes every time,
because there's always something that we can improve upon.
translation.es: porque siempre hay algo que podemos mejorar.

translation.en: Just standing up there, and seeing all the beauty up there,
translation.es: Estoy de pie y veo toda la belleza que hay allí.

translation.en: and feeling it--
It is the only way I can articulate why I'm frustrated,
translation.es: Es la única manera de expresar por qué me frustro.

translation.en: because it's not translating on camera.
translation.es: Porque no se refleja en la filmación.

translation.en: So my goal is simply that.
Like, it's just so everyone out there can feel what we feel.
translation.es: Que todos puedan sentir lo que sentimos nosotros.

translation.en: And I really have to have dedicated people that are... down for the cause.
translation.es: Y realmente debo tener gente comprometida con la causa.

translation.en: Whatever it is, let us know what we can prioritize,
translation.es: Sea lo que sea, dígannos qué podemos priorizar

translation.en: to try to facilitate everybody's needs
translation.es: para satisfacer las necesidades de todos

translation.en: so we can be done with having to talk so much.
translation.es: y así no tener que hablar tanto.

translation.en: That's where I am.
It's-- We're halfway there.
We just gotta make progress faster, because we're running out of time.
translation.es: Debemos avanzar más rápido, porque se nos acaba el tiempo.

translation.en: Thank you, everybody.
Thank y'all. I know everybody's working hard, so we'll get there.
translation.es: Gracias. Sé que todos se esfuerzan, así que lo lograremos.

translation.en: - All right, have a good anniversary. - Good night.
translation.es: - Que tengan un buen aniversario. - Adiós.

translation.en: It's my anniversary.
Happy anniversary.
Okay, guys.
Sing it loud!
So, if you know this dance... I want you to do it.
Here we go!
I'm talking to you.
I see y'all in the front row.

Sing it, y'all!
Sing it, y'all.
I see you.
Can I take this back?
Sing it, y'all.
I wanna see y'all do the dance.

I'm watching.
Let's see if you know it.

make some noise!

Question, everybody.
Anybody go to a HBCU?
- Hey! - Yes.
Don't you remember-- ?
All the HBCU people make some noise!
translation.es: ¡Griten los que fueron a una universidad negra!

translation.en: If you tried to go to college, make some noise.
translation.es: Si intentaron ir a la universidad, griten.

translation.en: Okay, okay.
If you dropped out of high school, make some noise!
- - Oh, shit.
Keep on pushing, Curtis Mayfield said.
Be a force for good, Coltrane said.
translation.es: Ser una fuerza para el bien, dijo Coltrane.

translation.en: Mississippi Goddam, says Nina Simone.
That ain't having hope.
That's being a hope.
Courageously bearing witness, regardless of what the circumstances is
translation.es: Valientemente dar testimonio, sin importar las circunstancias,

translation.en: because you're choosing to be a kind of person of integrity
translation.es: porque decides ser una persona tan íntegra como puedas

translation.en: to the best of your ability before the worms get your body.
translation.es: antes de que los gusanos se coman tu cuerpo.

translation.en: Boom.
I know the importance of us feeling we're a part of something,
translation.es: Sé lo importante que es sentirse parte de algo,

translation.en: like we're being spoken to, like it's worth it.
translation.es: sentir que nos hablan, que vale la pena.

translation.en: We all performed with all of our heart, and...
we performed with love and connection, and...
we did it together.
I love all of the people that were involved.
translation.es: Amo a todos los que participaron.

translation.en: Homecoming for an HBCU is...
translation.es: La bienvenida en una universidad negra...

translation.en: the Super Bowl.
It is the Coachella.
You got all your people coming back that you haven't seen for however long.
translation.es: Regresa toda tu gente, a la cual no has visto en mucho tiempo.

translation.en: You got all this tradition,
you got all these eyeballs wanting to see
if it's gonna be better than the last homecoming.
translation.es: si esta bienvenida será mejor que la anterior.

translation.en: All those elements are right here.
We have the Black National Anthem that happens after Freedom.
translation.es: Tocaremos el Himno Nacional Negro después de Freedom.

translation.en: Message in particular is just a very powerful, very strong message.
translation.es: Transmite un mensaje muy poderoso y fuerte.

translation.en: Very inclusive.
But it really makes you proud to be African- American.
I told my dad I joined a sorority.
translation.es: Le dije a mi papá que me uní a una sororidad.

translation.en: He started dying,
'cause there's so many great sisters in there.
Great freestylers, of course,
and, you know, we a family. It feels like a college trip.
translation.es: Somos una familia. Parece un viaje universitario.

translation.en: Be ready because we are going to put her on blast up there.
translation.es: Que la prensa se quede mucho. La haremos estallar en el escenario.

translation.en: we’re going to create shadows for this woman.
translation.es: Vamos a crear sombras para esta mujer.

translation.en: She's the best, and I only deal with number ones. Ya heard?
translation.es: Es la mejor, y yo solo trabajo con los número uno.

translation.en: Move in on the side. Here we go. One, two...
Creating something that will live beyond me,
something that will make people feel open
translation.es: algo que hará que la gente se abra,

translation.en: and like they're watching magic,
translation.es: como si estuvieran viendo un acto de magia,

translation.en: like they're living in a time that's super special, and...
translation.es: como si vivieran en una época muy especial

translation.en: like it's a day that they will never relive.
translation.es: y este fuera un día que nunca volverán a vivir.

translation.en: That's what I want.
Boy, look at that save!
It has been a family environment. I love it.
translation.es: Es un ambiente familiar. Me encanta.

translation.en: I don't even wanna go home after it's over with.
translation.es: No quiero volver a casa cuando se termine.

translation.en: If you know me, you know my family is...
translation.es: Quien me conoce sabe que mi familia...

translation.en: the biggest priority in my life.
My family is my sanctuary,
my weakness and my strength.
They're my tribe, and it was important
translation.es: Son mi tribu, y era importante

translation.en: that we all felt like family.
translation.es: que todos nos sintiéramos como una familia.

translation.en: It just was a dream come true
and something I feel like I've worked my entire life for.
translation.es: algo por lo que he trabajado toda mi vida.

translation.en: And I'm so grateful that I was able to come home.
translation.es: Estoy muy agradecida de haber podido regresar a casa.

translation.en: We got snares, cymbals, quads, and bass.
translation.es: Tenemos redoblantes, platillos, tenores y bombos.

translation.en: It's time for you to get a little taste
of the only drum line
certified by the Queen Bey,
guaranteed to show up and show out,
on your ass, anytime, anyplace, anywhere.
translation.es: en cualquier momento, lugar y situación.

translation.en: Introducing The Bzzzz.
Coachella, thank you for allowing me
to be the first Black woman to headline Coachella.
translation.es: ser la primera mujer negra en encabezar este festival.

translation.en: Ain't that 'bout a bitch?
This song is dedicated to all the incredible women
translation.es: Dedico esta canción a todas las mujeres increíbles

translation.en: that opened up the doors for me.
Thank you so much, ladies.
Do we have any strong women out there tonight?
- Sing along! -
Here we go!
We teach girls to shrink themselves, to make themselves smaller.
translation.es: Enseñamos a las chicas a encogerse, a hacerse más pequeñas.

translation.en: We say to girls, You can have ambition, but not too much.
translation.es: Les decimos: Puedes tener ambición, pero no demasiada.

translation.en: You should aim to be successful, but not too successful,
translation.es: Debes intentar tener éxito, pero no demasiado,

translation.en: otherwise, you will threaten the man.
translation.es: si no, serás una amenaza para el hombre.

translation.en: We raise girls to see each other as competitors.
translation.es: Criamos a las chicas para que compitan entre ellas.

translation.en: Not for jobs or for accomplishments, but for the attention of men.
translation.es: No por un trabajo o por logros, sino por la atención de los hombres.

translation.en: Feminist:
a person who believes in the social, political, and economic equality of the sexes.
translation.es: alguien que cree en la igualdad social, política y económica de los sexos.

translation.es: Un fuerte aplauso para la bella Kelly.

translation.es: - Y la hermosa Michelle. - Te amamos.

translation.es: Estoy tan feliz de que estén aquí.

translation.en: I feel we made something
that made my daughter proud.
translation.es: Hice que mi hija se enorgullezca.

translation.en: Made my mother proud, my father proud,
translation.es: Hice que mis padres se enorgullezcan.

translation.en: I mean, and all of the people that are my brothers and sisters around the world,
translation.es: Y también todos mis hermanos y hermanas en todo el mundo.

translation.en: and that's why I live.
I'm so lucky and grateful that I'm able to take all these crazy ideas
translation.es: Agradezco tener la suerte de poder tomar todas estas ideas locas

translation.en: and actually make it into something that heals people
translation.es: y convertirlas en algo que sane a la gente

translation.en: and that may spark vision in people.
translation.es: y la inspire a lograr cosas.

translation.en: That shows them to dream big,
translation.es: Algo que les muestre que pueden soñar en grande,

translation.en: that shows them that they are limitless.
translation.es: que les muestre que no tienen límites.

translation.en: It's possible.
If my country ass can do it, they can do it.
translation.es: Si una pueblerina como yo pudo hacerlo, ellos también pueden.

translation.en: That's nice. I've never been asked that question.
translation.es: Qué bien. Jamás me habían hecho esa pregunta.

translation.en: Joy. Brings me joy.
♪ Put a rainbow in the clouds ♪
translation.es: Pon un arcoíris en las nubes

translation.en: I want to--
What I really want to do...
is be a representative of my race, of the human race.
translation.es: ...es representar a mi raza, a la raza humana.

translation.en: I have a chance...
to show how kind we can be,
how intelligent and generous we can be.
I have a chance to-- to teach, and...
and to love, and to laugh, and--
I know that when I'm finished doing what I'm sent here to do,
translation.es: Sé que cuando termine de hacer lo que me enviaron a hacer,

translation.en: I will be called home.
And I will go home without any fear
translation.es: Y me iré a casa sin temor,

translation.en: or trepidation,cause I'm
wondering what's gonna happen.
And...
what advice would you have
to give this generation?
Tell the truth.
To yourself first.
And to the children.
Live in the present.
Don't deny the past.
Live in the present and know the charge on you
translation.es: Vivan en el presente y sepan que su tarea

translation.en: is to make this country more than it is today.
translation.es: es lograr que este país sea más de lo que es hoy.

translation.en: I want to sing this last song
to all of my incredible,
beautiful fans,
loyal fans, ride or- dies.
It's dedicated to my incredible Beyhive.
translation.es: Se la dedico a mi increíble colmena.
